PERSONAL DETAILS

QUALIFICATIONS  
 
Amity Business School, Amity University Master of Business Administration, (Human

Aligarh Muslim University Aliga rh M.A. (Psychology) (Organization Behavior)  
 
Aligarh Muslim University Aligarh B.A. (Psychology)  
 
 
CAREER SUMMARY  
 
April 2016  – Present : Tabuk Pharmaceuticals Mfg. Co  
Position: HR BUSINESS PARTNER -MIDDLE EAST  
 
❖ Develop, Modify & Implement the efficient HR Procedures for each HR function  
across ME region.  
❖ Anticipate & deliver the performance objectives for each employee during mid & 
end of the year: Followed by driving performance management and subsequently 
taking the decisions on bonus/incentives & increments.  
❖ Lead & drive calibrati on sessions across teams on different HR aspects such as 
performance management, talent mapping etc.  
❖ Act as coach to build organizational capabilities and partner with key stakeholders 
to optimize team performance.  
❖ Prepare & evaluate training need anal ysis for employees based on the discussion 
& findings of immediate supervisors and aligning them with ME yearly training 
calendar.  
❖ Review the present HR policy of the company along with initiating any 
modification with suitable aspects of present scenari o & situation subsequently 
aligning with all stakeholders.  
    
❖ Analyse  HR budget of preceding year and based on the finding, evaluate HR 
budget & Training budget for succeeding year with justifying assumptions: followed 
by manpower planning aligning with all  departmental & country heads.  
❖ Evaluate & discuss Job Analysis of present employees on yearly basis and develop 
& modify Job Descriptions along with KPI ’s for each position.  
❖ Plan, develop and execute the process of succession planning in different 
segm ents through identifying successors for key positions.  
❖ Initiate, develop & Implement talent mapping thorough the region through 
developing future leaders on quantified KPIs.  
❖ Drive a unique HR strategy & policy for each country aligning with country hea ds 
and ensuring to be bench marked with company policy, vision & mission.  
❖ Keep abreast on recruitment process for replacements & new job vacancies along 
with interviewing prospective candidates and take hiring decisions.  
❖ Work as a change catalyst and i ntroduce innovative ideas such as organizing team 
building activities, gaming etc. for employee engagement, recognition & retention.  
❖ Review & approve payroll & incentives along with structuring & implementing ICP 
(Invective Compensation Plan) for Sales &  Marketing team across the region.  
❖ Introduce & plan effective training practices along with scheduling the yearly 
training initiatives consisting of soft skills & technical training; analyse  training 
feedback surveys to fetch the results followed by an a ction plan.  
❖ Execute updating of employee ’s information in SAP and extract key reports from 
SAP as per the need.  
 
ACHIEVEMENTS :  
❖ Initiated & executed talent mapping & succession planning within a very short 
span of time.  
❖ Prepared & implemented employee engagement/ employee well -being modules 
as a part of retention strategy.  
❖ Aligned all the countries on same page in respect of policies & procedures to drive 
the ME ag enda of the company.  
❖ Successfully developed Job Descriptions along with specific KPI ’s for each job 
category through job evaluation.  
❖ Developed a new model of Saudization plan (A KSA government initiative to 
recruit more citizens)  
❖ Amended and modified  HR policies & procedures as per market trends and 
current situation.  
❖ Successfully developed & executed the new training module consisting of 
technical & non -technical training with effective results.  
❖ Initiated a new program based on professional -perso nal life balance.  
❖ Successfully launched &
